oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mothers Club Plaque from Kenrick Hall
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Plaques; Kenrick Hall; Clubs; Organizations
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The plaque reads: "THE CBHS MOTHERS CLUB. This plaque symbolizes the appreciation of the Christian Brothers for the tremendous moral and material support of the College by the Mothers' Club of CBHS," followed by the names of the Mothers' Club presidents from 1929-1965.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While CBU may house an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under copyright law. For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
